Name: Life After Death
About the game: Life After Death is a fictional survival game. During time of wars and diseases you must survive in this game, you will encounter zombies, animals and soldiers to defeat with hunting and crafting your own resources, to build your safety in an aggressive open world, in this starting version there is only one region to explore but with time will have more regions to explore and more should happen. Its up to you survive in this game, a challenge. Fully playable with core game engine established some additions could be added. Crafting implemented, hunting implemented, building implemented, skills implemented, quests implemented, ballistics partial implemented, save system partial implemented.
